metadata.title: CVE-2020-6108 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in thefsck_chk_orphan_node functionality of F2fs-Tools F2fs.Fsck 1.13. Aspecially crafted f2fs filesystem can cause a heap buffer overflowresulting in a code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file totrigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: f2fs-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
